formato.descripcion: Compact Disc, a digital optical disc used to store audio recordings with high quality and a capacity of up to 74–80 minutes of uncompressed audio.
Vinyl record, an analog sound storage medium in the form of a flat disc, valued for its warm sound quality and used by audiophiles.
Blu-ray Disc, a digital optical disc format capable of storing high-definition audio and video, with support for lossless audio formats.

genero.descripcion: It fuses elements of heavy metal with influences from hip-hop, alternative rock, funk, and other genres like industrial and hardcore punk. Characterized by its aggressive sound, nu metal often features downtuned guitars, syncopated rhythms, and rap-style vocals.

It is characterized by its roots in gospel music and rhythm and blues (R&B), and is known for its intense emotional delivery and vocal embellishments. Soul music combines elements of gospel, R&B, and jazz, and is often distinguished by its powerful vocals, call-and-response patterns, and use of church-rooted elements.

Metalcore is a musical genre that blends elements of hardcore punk and heavy metal. It emerged in the early 1990s and is characterized by distorted guitar riffs, intense drumming techniques, and vocal styles that range from screaming and shouting to clean singing.

Pop music is characterized by catchy melodies, simple structures, and broad appeal. It blends various styles like rock, And electronic. Pop songs often feature relatable lyrics and repetitive hooks, making them memorable and accessible.

Heavy metal is known for its loud, aggressive sound and powerful guitar riffs. It often features fast tempos, distorted guitars, and intense drumming. Lyrics can explore dark themes like rebellion, fantasy, and personal struggles. The genre has a strong, dedicated fanbase and has evolved into many subgenres.

Rock music is defined by its use of electric guitars, strong rhythms, and energetic performances. It often blends elements of blues, folk, and country, with lyrics that cover a wide range of themes. Rock can range from soft ballads to high-energy anthems. The genre has been a major influence on modern music and culture.

Thrash metal is a subgenre of heavy metal that emerged in the early 1980s, characterized by its fast tempo, aggressive guitar riffs, and politically charged lyrics. It combines the drum beats of hardcore punk with the guitar style of the new wave of British heavy metal.
